attributes.action: To FA: “No yellow for goals in grieve”
attributes.background:
Supporting football players who dedicate their goals to the memory of those who passed away. Celebration and removal of shirt in such circumstances should not be punished.
Set your intentions to referee before the match and avoid being booked.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This issue is the responsibility of the Football Association.
